Cameron Moore

Hi, I'm Cameron

My formative growth as a developer has been shaped by industry-professionals and daily collaboration with remote teams. In addition to a solid understanding of web fundamentals I have experience collaborating within an Agile team to deliver features for a real stakeholder.

Me Again

It's me again

Somnus

  • Project

    A responsive marketing website for a sleep-tracking web app. Guided by a provided visual design I used {less}, a CSS pre-processor, to layout elements and implement responsive view-widths for desktop and mobile.

  • Purpose and Goal

    I used HTML and {less} to build an accurate representation of the visual design which provides a user-friendly setting to learn more about the app

  • Lessons Learned

    After taking the training wheels off we got comfortable enough with the code base to make some changes to the existing structure

Story Squad

  • Project

    Story Squad is a creative story sharing platform for kids. I worked with real stakeholders to devise solutions within an actionable scope of 2 weeks.

  • Purpose and Goal

    Using an agile approach our team designed targeted solutions within an actionable scope of 2 weeks.

  • Lessons Learned

    After taking the training wheels off we got comfortable enough with the code base to make some changes to the existing structure
